sentences.sContent: The son of a pharmacology professor was not unique in his generation.
sentences.sContent_eng: The son of a pharmacology professor was not unique in his generation.
sentences.sCn: 这位药理学教授的儿子在他这一代人中并不特别。

sentences.sContent: As a medical student 20 years ago, I learned all about anatomy, physiology and pharmacology.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a medical student 20 years ago, I learned all about anatomy, physiology and pharmacology.
sentences.sCn: 20年前，我是一名学医的学生，我学会了所有的解剖学，生理性和和药理学。

words.tran: 遗传药理学；药物基因学

trans.tranOther: the scientific study of drugs and medicines
